transcript: Well then why is she still single? I mean New York is full of men. Why isn't she married? Probably a hundred people told her she's crazy, but she's waited.

segments.text: Well then why is she still single? I mean New York is full of men. Why isn't she married?
Probably a hundred people told her she's crazy, but she's waited.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Well then why is she still single?  I mean, New York is full of men.  Why isn't she married?  Probably a hundred people told her she's crazy, but she's waited.
